titleStmt.title: The Earl of Sunderland's letter to a friend in London Plainly discovering the designs of the Romish party, and others, for the subverting of the Protestant religion, and the laws of the kingdom. Licensed and entred, March. 23d. 1689.
titleStmt.author: Sunderland, Robert Spencer, Earl of, 1640-1702.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
